question:
You are planning a business trip to another city. You will have some free time to do some sight seeing while you are there.
Write a letter to a friend who lives in the city you will visit. In your letter
explain the purpose of the trip
ask about things to do and see in the city
invite your friend to do something with you during your visit
text: Hope you are well. I am writing this letter to you about my business trip that will occur in Milano, on 15th of May. My business trip will continue for seven days. However, at the weekend, I will be free for some sightseeing.

My company has made an agreement with a big Italian leather company. Company managers have invited us to workshops in Milano. The main issue of workshops is getting to know each other better and trying to understand each of our works cultures.

I want to spend my time efficiently because it is limited. So I want to ask you how should I spend my time in Milano. Which places do you suggest I visit ? May I learn the best historical places and museums in Milano ?
I would be very glad if we can have  dinner at least one night. We haven't seen each other since 2014. We might eat pasta at your favourite restaurant and catch up if you are suitable.
